com.brightcove.plugin.onceux

Class AdInfoOverlayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.AdInfoOverlayManager

  • public class AdInfoOverlayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a class to manage ad information overlays. These overlays sit on top of a video during an ad break to indicate the ad progress ("Your video will resume in xx seconds") and to provide a link to find out more information about the ad topic ("Learn More >>").

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Build a manager given the Android context, the Brightcove video view and the event emitter.
